    • Field Detail

      • root

        private ImageOnTree root

    • Constructor Detail

      • TreeOfImages

        public TreeOfImages()
        Basic constructor for Tree class. post: it allows to create a Tree object with it's root reference == null.

    • Method Detail

      • addNode

        public void addNode(int value)
        This method changes the root reference to the new node created with the value passed as parameter in case that root == null, otherwise it just calls to the recursive method to add the new node. post: the new node created with required value is going to be added to the tree.
        Parameters:
        value - the value needed to create the new node.
        See Also:
        addNode(ImageOnTree, ImageOnTree)

      • addNode

        public void addNode(ImageOnTree n,
                    ImageOnTree current)
        This method adds recursively a node passed as parameter into the tree. pre: current cannot be null. post: the new node is going to be added to the tree.
        Parameters:
        n - the new node.
        current - the necessary node reference to apply recursion.

      • selectRandomNode

        public ImageOnTree selectRandomNode()
        This method just calls the recursive one only if root != null and returns a random node from the tree, otherwise it returns null.
        Returns:
        a partly-random chosen node or null.

      • selectRandomNode

        private ImageOnTree selectRandomNode(ImageOnTree current,
                                     int size)
        This method returns a random node from the tree if and only if root != null. pre: root != null. post: a partly random node from the tree will be returned.
        Parameters:
        current - necessary parameter in order to apply recursion.
        size - the size or weight of the tree which is passed as parameter to this function mainly to avoid calling the size() method every time this method calls itself and making it more efficient.
        Returns:
        current the node which has been chosen by a random condition inside the method.

      • size

        public int size()
        This method returns the size or also called weight of the tree. In case that root == null it returns 0, otherwise it calls the recursive method for size to calculate this value. post: the returned value is the number of nodes in the tree.
        Specified by:
        size in interface Measurable
        See Also:
        size(ImageOnTree)

      • size

        private int size(ImageOnTree current)
        This recursive method calculates the weight of the tree. pre: current != null post: the returned value is the number of nodes in the tree.
        Parameters:
        current - the necessary parameter to make this function recursive.
        Returns:
        size the correspondent weight of the tree.

      • getRoot

        public ImageOnTree getRoot()
        Getter method for root attribute.
        Returns:
        root the reference for the root node of the tree.
